title: $100,000 Helmet Could Become the NFL's Standard (Podcast)
itunes:title: $100,000 Helmet Could Become the NFL's Standard (Podcast)
description:
National Football League Players Association Executive Director DeMaurice discusses a host of topics, including what he calls the league's mismanagement of player discipline for members like Tom Brady and Ezekiel Elliott. Smith also talks about the league's declining television audience, whether there's too much football on TV and, of course, the issue of head trauma and player safety. He also touches on the biggest myths about the NFL, which is the most-watched U.S. sports league. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
